scripts.local-serve: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev" "cd vue-app && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-deploy: sls deploy --stage dev && node deploy.js dev
scripts.prod-deploy: sls deploy --stage prod && node deploy.js prod
scripts.dev-remove: node deploy.js dev remove && sls remove --stage dev
scripts.prod-remove: node deploy.js prod remove && sls remove --stage prod
